{{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=XG 86 |revision=(rev 1) |asin=B07S211TRT |newegg=9SIAA7WDZJ4471 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf_model=CB-6912 |manuf_rev=REV A0 |availability=EoL (03/31/2025) |est_release_date=08/2020 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=E3930 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3-1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDINBDG4-16G |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25U6473FM2I-10G |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=ADATA |ram1_model=DDR3 SODIMM |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ-45,, USB Female Micro-B,, (38400 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111G |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8111G |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111G |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6791D;;1;,,, 5V RS-232 Transceiver;MaxLinear;SP213E;;1;,,, USB Full Speed to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT234XD;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, Dual D-Type Flip-Flop w/Set and Reset;NXP;74LVC74AD;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;2;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, Transient Voltage Suppressing Device;Amazing Microelectronic Corp;AZ3028-04P;;8;,,, 16V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter w/Adjustable Current Limit;MPS;MPQ8633A;;1;,,, Dual Output 3 & 2 Phase Controller w/Single Intel Proprietary Interface;ON Semi;NCP81243;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel Enhancement Mode Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6921GMT;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery, power switch, metal case, heat sink |oui_eth=7C:5A:1C }} {{TagLine|Sophos XG 86 UTM Firewall}} :[https://community.sophos.com/utm-firewall Support page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.3GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, :16GB SanDisk eMMC *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Sophos XG 86 Rev 1 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos XG 86 Rev 1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Sophos XG 86 Rev 1 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
